byline.original: By NICOLE PERLROTH and MICHAEL CORKERY

abstract: Researchers at digital security firm Symantec announce they have uncovered evidence that North Korea was behind string of digital attacks on Asian banks; say this is first nation-state known to employ malicious code to steal purely for financial profit.
lead_paragraph: Security researchers say this is the first known case of a nation using malicious code to steal money for pure financial profit.

headline.main: North Korea Linked to Digital Attacks on Global Banks
headline.print_headline: North Koreans Tied to Attacks at Asian Banks

snippet: Security researchers say this is the first known case of a nation using malicious code to steal money for pure financial profit.

keywords.value: SWIFT(Society for Worldwide Interbank Financial Telecommunication)
keywords.name: organizations
